customer.id.description: The ID of the customer associated with the bidding strategy.

campaign.id.description: The ID of the campaign associated with the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.aligned_campaign_budget.description: The ID of the campaign budget that this bidding strategy is aligned with.

bidding_strategy.campaign_count.description: The total count of campaigns that are using this bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.currency_code.description: The currency code used by the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.effective_currency_code.description: The effective currency code applied by the bidding strategy across campaigns.

bidding_strategy.enhanced_cpc.description: Indicates if Enhanced CPC (ECPC) is enabled for this bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.id.description: The unique ID of the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.maximize_conversion_val.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for Maximize Conversion Value strategy.
The minimum CPC bid floor in micros for Maximize Conversion Value strategy.
The target Return on Ad Spend (ROAS) for Maximize Conversion Value strategy.

bidding_strategy.maximize_conversions.cp.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for Maximize Conversions strategy.
The minimum CPC bid floor in micros for Maximize Conversions strategy.

bidding_strategy.maximize_conversions.ta.description: The target Cost per Acquisition (CPA) in micros for Maximize Conversions strategy.

bidding_strategy.name.description: The name of the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.non_removed_campaign_co.description: The count of active campaigns that are using this bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.resource_name.description: The resource name of the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.status.description: The status of the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_cpa.cpc_bid_ceil.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for Target CPA strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_cpa.cpc_bid_floo.description: The minimum CPC bid floor in micros for Target CPA strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_cpa.target_cpa_m.description: The target Cost per Acquisition (CPA) in micros for Target CPA strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_impression_share.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for Target Impression Share strategy.
The targeted location for Impression Share in Target Impression Share strategy.
The fraction of requested location's impressions targeted by Target Impression Share.

bidding_strategy.target_roas.cpc_bid_cei.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for Target ROAS strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_roas.cpc_bid_flo.description: The minimum CPC bid floor in micros for Target ROAS strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_roas.target_roas.description: The target Return on Ad Spend (ROAS) for Target ROAS strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_spend.cpc_bid_ce.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for Target Spend strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_spend.target_spe.description: The target spend in micros for Target Spend strategy.

bidding_strategy.type.description: The type of bidding strategy used.

segments.date.description: The date segment for the data.
